mapper.select: SELECT EZC_CHANNEL_CITYCD.CHANNEL_CD AS channelCd /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CITYCD.CITY_CD AS cityCd /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CITYCD.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CITYCD.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_CHANNEL_CITYCD /* 채널 도시코드 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_CHANNEL_CITYCD.CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ AND EZC_CHANNEL_CITYCD.CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_CHANNEL_CITYCD /* 채널 도시코드 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_CHANNEL_CITYCD.CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_CHANNEL_CITYCD.CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* #### SQL Body [[ ################# */ SELECT EZC_CHANNEL_CITYCD.CHANNEL_CD AS channelCd /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CITYCD.CITY_CD AS cityCd /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CITYCD.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CITYCD.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_CHANNEL_CITYCD /* 채널 도시코드 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_CHANNEL_CITYCD.CHANNEL_CD = #{param.channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_CHANNEL_CITYCD.CITY_CD = #{param.cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
ORDER BY EZC_CHANNEL_CITYCD.CHANNEL_CD DESC /* #### SQL Body ]] ################# */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_CHANNEL_CITYCD SET /* 채널 도시코드 */ WHERE 1=1 AND CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ AND CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_CHANNEL_CITYCD /* 채널 도시코드 */ WHERE 1=1 AND CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ AND CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
